Directives.val: Creates a #if directive and a #endif directive. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Anywhere ]
Creates a #region directive and a #endregion directive. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Anywhere. ]
Creates a using directive. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a namespace (including the global namespace). ]

Declarations.val: Creates a declaration for a class that derives from Attribute. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a namespace (including the global namespace), a class, or a struct. ]
Creates a class declaration. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a namespace (including the global namespace), a class, or a struct. ]
Creates an enum declaration. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a namespace (including the global namespace), a class, or a struct. ]
Creates a method declaration that overrides the Equals method defined in the Object class. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a class or a struct. ]

Creates a declaration for a class that derives from an exception (Exception by default). [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a namespace (including the global namespace), a class, or a struct. ]
Creates an indexer declaration. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a class or a struct. ]
Creates an interface declaration. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a namespace (including the global namespace), a class, or a struct. ]
Creates a namespace declaration. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a namespace (including the global namespace). ]
Creates an auto-implemented property declaration. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a class or a struct. ]
Creates a property declaration with get and set accessors. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a class or a struct. ]
Creates a static int Main method declaration. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a class or a struct. ]
Creates a struct declaration. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a namespace (including the global namespace), a class, or a struct. ]
Creates a static void Main method declaration. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a class or a struct. ]

Creates an else block. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a method, an indexer, a property accessor, or an event accessor. ]
Creates an if block. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a method, an indexer, a property accessor, or an event accessor. ]
Creates a block that safely invokes an event. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a method, an indexer, a property accessor, or an event accessor. ]
Creates a lock block. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a method, an indexer, a property accessor, or an event accessor. ]
Creates a switch block. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a method, an indexer, a property accessor, or an event accessor. ]
Creates a try-catch block. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a method, an indexer, a property accessor, or an event accessor. ]
Creates a try-finally block. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a method, an indexer, a property accessor, or an event accessor. ]
Creates an unchecked block. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a method, an indexer, a property accessor, or an event accessor. ]
Creates an unsafe block. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a method, an indexer, a property accessor, or an event accessor. ]

Loops.val: Creates a do while loop. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a method, an indexer, a property accessor, or an event accessor. ]
Creates a for loop. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a method, an indexer, a property accessor, or an event accessor. ]
Creates a foreach loop. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a method, an indexer, a property accessor, or an event accessor. ]
Creates a for loop that decrements the loop variable after each iteration. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a method, an indexer, a property accessor, or an event accessor. ]
Creates a while loop. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a method, an indexer, a property accessor, or an event accessor. ]

Others.val: Creates a constructor for the containing class. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a class. ]
Creates a destructor for the containing class. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a class. ]
Creates a call to WriteLine. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a method, an indexer, a property accessor, or an event accessor. ]
Creates an iterator. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a class or a struct. ]
Creates a 'named' iterator and indexer pair by using a nested class. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a class or a struct. ]

Creates a call to MessageBox.Show. You may have to add a reference to System.Windows.Forms.dll. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a method, an indexer, a property accessor, or an event accessor. ]
Creates a read-only auto-implemented property with a private 'set' accessor. [ Valid locations to insert snippet: Inside a class or a struct. ]
